// Initialisation frames

// 0x52F7C Idle 00
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 00 10 00 04 1F 00 00 00 10 00 00 00 02 00 10 00 12 00 D0 00 11 00 18 00 33 00 B4 00 34 00 00 00 24 00 03 

// 0x52FD4 Running 01
00 00 F0 FF 00 02 10 00 10 00 12 00 D0 00 11 00 80 07 1F 00 18 00 33 00 B4 00 34 00 00 00 24 00 08 00 00 10 04

// 0x53044 Running Loop?  02
00 00 F0 FF 0C 00 00 10 02

// 0x5308C Stopping 03
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 01 14 00 00 10 18 00 33 00 B4 00 34 00 00 00 24 00 02

// 0x530C8 Dash 04
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 0E 01 00 80 00 11 00 00 0E 1F 00 68 00 02 00 10 00 12 00 00 00 24 00 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 1F 00 00 23 00 00 10 01 18 00 00 10 65 02 00 28 02

// 0x53158 Running Turn Around ??
00 00 F0 FF 18 00 33 00 B4 00 34 00 00 00 24 00 24 00 00 10 02

// 0x5318C Standing Turning Around 05
00 00 F0 FF 00 01 10 00 80 07 1F 00 18 00 33 00 B4 00 34 00 00 00 24 00 20 00 00 10 01

// 0x531C0 Falling 06
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 00 01 10 00 10 00 11 00 10 00 12 00 80 05 1F 00 00 00 24 00 18 00 33 00 B4 00 34 00 28 00 00 10 02 00 F0 FF 29 00 00 10 04

// 0x53238 Jumping 07
00 00 F0 FF 80 00 10 00 A8 00 02 00 10 00 11 00 10 00 12 00 80 05 1F 00 00 00 24 00 2C 00 00 10 68 02 00 28 01

// 0x53284 Landing 08
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 12 00 80 01 11 00 00 06 1F 00 00 00 24 00 00 00 10 01 34 00 00 10 6B 02 00 28 03

// 0x532C0 Air Dash 09
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 01 00 00 FF 00 00 10 01 00 80 00 11 00 80 07 1F 00 80 00 02 00 10 00 12 00 00 00 24 00 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 20 00 00 23 38 00 00 10 25 03 00 28 01

// 0x53334 Punch One 0A
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 D0 00 11 00 00 00 10 01 40 00 00 10 08 00 00 11 6E 02 00 28 01

// 0x533AC Punch Two 0B
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 D0 00 11 00 00 00 10 01 48 00 00 10 08 00 00 11 6E 02 00 28 01

// 0x53424 Punch Three 0C
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 D0 00 11 00 00 00 10 01 50 00 00 10 08 00 00 11 6E 02 00 28 01

// 0x534AC Heavy Attack 0D
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 D0 00 11 00 00 00 10 01 58 00 00 10 33 01 00 28 01

// 0x535A0 Uppercut
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 D0 00 11 00 00 00 10 01 68 00 00 10 33 01 00 28 02

// 0x5362C Dash Attack
00 00 F0 FF 60 00 02 00 74 00 00 10 6E 02 00 28 01

// 0x536B0 Eagle Kick Pursuit Move
00 00 F0 FF B0 00 02 00 0A 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 80 00 00 10 71 02 00 28 01

// 0x537A0 Eagle Kick
00 00 F0 FF 88 00 00 10 6E 02 00 28 01

// 0x53818 Different version of Eagle Kick?
00 00 F0 FF 88 00 00 10 74 02 00 28 01

// (This version is a bit different.  I'm not sure why.)

// 0x5389C Air Kick
00 00 F0 FF 10 00 12 00 08 00 00 12 94 00 00 10 01

00 F0 FF 95 00 00 10 6E 02 00 28 03

// 0x53914 Shockwave Left/Right
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 A0 00 11 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 24 25 00 00 23 00 00 20 00 00 00 21

00 F0 FF 22 00 10 00 23 00 A0 00 24 00 05 00 27 00 01 00 25 00 02 00 26 00 9C 00 00 10 2B 03 00 28 01

// 0x53A20 Random Cut to a Fall?
00 00 F0 FF 06

// 0x53A28 Another Random Cut to a Fall?
00 00 F0 FF 06

// 0x53A30 More Data About Left/Right Spindash?
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 80 00 11 00 10 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 20 00 00 00 21 00 F8 FF 22 00 14 00 23 00 20 01 24 00 05 00 27 00 01 00 25 00 02 00 26 00 A2 00 00 10 2B 03 00 28 02

// 0x53B20 ??
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 24 00 06

// 0x53B2C Literally the same as above.
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 24 00 06

// 0x53B38 Ring Throw
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 A0 00 11 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 24 22 00 00 23 B4 00 00 10 21 01 00 28 02

// 0x53BAC Shockwave Spindash Down
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 01 00 00 10 00 80 00 11 00 00 28 1F 00 08 00 12 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 21 00 00 00 22 00 10 00 23 00 60 01 24 00 3C 00 27 00 0A 00 25 00 05 00 26 00 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 1F 00 00 23 BC 00 00 10 29 03 00 28 00 00 50 01 02

// 0x53C98 Reset to Idle?

// 0x53CA0 Aerial Trap
00 00 F0 FF D0 FF 02 00 80 00 12 00 00 00 10 00 A0 00 11 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 20 00 00 00 21 00 00 00 22 00 10 00 23 00 20 01 24 00 14 00 27 00 0A 00 25 00 04 00 26 00 BF 00 00 10 2A 03 00 28 01

00 F0 FF 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 24 00 00 23 BD 00 00 10 04

// 0x53D78 - Related to the Down Shockwave Special?
00 00 F0 FF C0 00 02 00 A0 00 10 00 10 00 11 00 10 00 12 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 21 00 00 00 22 00 10 00 23 00 20 01 24 00 0A 00 27 00 0A 00 25 00 04 00 26 00 BD 00 00 10 02

// Hmmm
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 24 00 00 23 BE 00 00 10 03

// 0xB3DD0 Also related to the Shockwave Spindash Up special?
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 20 00 00 00 21 00 00 00 22 00 10 00 23 00 20 01 24 00 05 00 27 00 0A 00 25 00 04 00 26 00 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 24 00 00 23 BF 00 00 10 00 00 50 01 02

// 0x53E2C Grounded Trap
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 A0 00 11 00 00 00 10 01 C8 00 00 10 02

// Hmmmm
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 24 2D 00 00 23 2A 01 00 28 03

// 0x53EA0 Not a clue.
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 01 04

// 0x53EB4 Also no idea.  Resets to Idle?

// 0x53EBC Jumps between Idle, punching and Aerial Trap?  Really bizarre.
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 A0 00 11 00 60 00 02 00 09 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 D0 00 00 10 02

// From above, looks like an init frame, considering the properties of this attack, maybe screwed? Maybe it's multiple crudely chained from a beta or somin
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 24 2E 00 00 23 2A 01 00 28 03

// 0x53F34 ??
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 01 04

// 0x53F48 Reset to Idle?

// 0x53F50 Getting Hit Animation
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 03 00 00 23 D8 00 00 10 77 02 00 28 04

// 0x53F8C Flung Backwards
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 EB 01 00 30 00 02 00 A8 00 11 00 04 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 04 00 00 23 DC 00 00 10 7A 02 00 28 01

00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 00 00 10 00 06 00 F0 00 00
00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 01 11 00 A0 00 02 00 08 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 04 00 00 23 E4 00 00 10 7A 02 00 28 02

00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 06 00 F0 00 00
00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 01 11 00 60 00 02 00 08 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 04 00 00 23 E4 00 00 10 7A 02 00 28 02

// I'mma be real with you THQ, how does this have 3 init frame like things and each in a pair?

// 0x5408C Knocked into the Air
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 01 11 00 A0 00 02 00 08 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 04 00 00 23 E4 00 00 10 7A 02 00 28 02

// 0x54104 Knocked Into The Air??
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 01 11 00 60 00 02 00 08 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 04 00 00 23 E4 00 00 10 7A 02 00 28 02

// 0x5417C Related to getting hit?
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 E0 FF 01 00 10 00 11 00 10 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 50 00 02 00 08 00 12 00 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 03 00 00 23 D8 00 00 10 77 02 00 28 03

// 0x541CC Related to getting hit?
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 E0 FE 02 00 10 00 11 00 10 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 03 00 00 23 D8 00 00 10 7A 02 00 28 03

// 0x54214 Getting Back Up
00 00 F0 FF 00 FC 01 00 60 00 02 00 20 00 11 00 0E 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 F4 00 00 10 7F 02 00 28 02

// 0x54268 Also a 'getting back up' animation?
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 FA 01 00 60 00 02 00 08 00 11 00 0E 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 03 00 00 23 D8 00 00 10 7F 02 00 28 04

// 0x542CC Falling the ground ouch style
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 80 FD 01 00 10 00 11 00 A0 00 02 00 0A 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 05 00 00 23 EC 00 00 10 82 02 00 28 02

// 0x543C0 Getting Back up after an ouch landing
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 00 01 00 80 00 11 00 A0 00 02 00 08 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 08 00 00 23 F4 00 00 10 82 02 00 28 08

// 0x5441C Related to getting knocked into the air??
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 A0 00 02 00 08 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 04 00 00 23 E4 00 00 10 7A 02 00 28 02

// 0x54490 More getting flung backwards?
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 EB 01 00 30 00 02 00 A8 00 11 00 04 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 04 00 00 23 DC 00 00 10 7A 02 00 28 01

// 0x54590 ??
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 01

// 0x545A4 Knocked into the air and then falling after?
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 A0 00 02 00 08 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 04 00 00 23 E4 00 00 10 7A 02 00 28 02

// 0x54618 Getting hit normally and then getting back onto feet?
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 F6 01 00 60 00 02 00 08 00 11 00 0E 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 03 00 00 23 D8 00 00 10 7A 02 00 28 04

// 0x5467C Knocked into the Air?
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 01 11 00 A0 00 02 00 08 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 04 00 00 23 E4 00 00 10 7A 02 00 28 02

// 0x546F4 Related to getting back up?
00 00 F0 FF 80 00 11 00 60 00 02 00 0A 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 24 F5 00 00 10 06

// 0x5472C Start to jump back onto feet and initiate idle?
00 00 F0 FF 80 00 11 00 0E 00 12 00 00 00 34 00 00 00 10 01 E8 00 00 10 04

// 0x54798 Actually get back onto feet.
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 A0 00 11 00 00 00 24 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 24 0A 00 00 23 04 01 00 10 18 00 33 00 B4 00 34 00 02

// 0x547D0 Actually get back onto feet?  First two frames.
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 24 0B 00 00 23 05 01 00 10 01

// 0x547F8 Actually get back onto feet?
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 01 05 01 00 10 02

// 0x54818 Shield Stun
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 FE 01 00 10 00 11 00 0E 00 12 00 00 00 24 00 00 00 10 01 08 01 00 10 85 02 00 28 04

// 0x54858 I NEED HEALING (First Frame)
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 01 0C 01 00 10 01

// 0x54870 I NEED HEALING (Loop)
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 12 00 00 01 11 00 00 00 24 00 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 0C 00 00 23 00 00 10 01 86 02 00 28 01

// 0x548C8 I NEED HEALING (Ending?)
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 12 00 00 01 11 00 00 00 10 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 24 00 00 00 10 01 0D 01 00 10 02

// 0x5490C Wall Jump
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 01 00 00 FF 00 14 01 00 10 01

// 0x54924 The first two frames of being knocked into the air.  Repeatedly.
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 10 01 00 00 34 00 00 00 24 00 10 00 12 00 E4 00 00 10 02

// 0x5499C Landing and Dying.
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 24 00 00 00 FF 00 00 FE 01 00 60 00 02 00 A0 00 11 00 0A 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 34 00 F5 00 00 10 06

// 0x549F8 ??
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 00 10 01 FF

// 54A0C Respawn Icon
00 00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 06 10 00 00 02 11 00 00 06 1F 00 00 00 10 01 18 01 00 10 02
